.larger[What would you do?]

**`20150307` cannot be coerced into any of these functions!** 


---

.larger[Time Zones]

```{r}
x <- ymd_h("2021-4-25 6", tz = "America/Los_Angeles")
x
```

--

.pull-left[
`force_tz()` 
  * **same clock time** as input, new time zone

```{r}
force_tz(x, tzone = "America/Denver")
```
]

--

.pull-right[
`with_tz()`
  * **new clock time**, as it would appear in a different time zone

```{r}
with_tz(x, tzone = "America/Denver")
```

]

---

.larger[Time of Day]

```{r}
x
```


.pull-left[

- `am()`
- `pm()`

`TRUE` or `FALSE` values for whether the time occurs in the AM or PM
] 

.pull-right[
```{r}
am(x)
pm(x)
```
]
